INSERT INTO route_detail(route_order, username, route_code, route_date, site, lon, lat, category, stime, etime) VALUES
( #{item.route_order}, #{item.username}, #{item.route_code}, #{item.route_date}, #{item.site}, #{item.lon}, #{item.lat}, #{item.category}, #{item.stime}, #{item.etime})
mapper.select: SELECT route_detail.route_order as route_order, route_detail.username as username, route_detail.route_code as route_code, route_detail.route_date as route_date, route_detail.site as site, route_detail.lon as lon, route_detail.lat as lat, route_detail.category as category, route_detail.stime as stime, route_detail.etime as etime, route.routename as routename FROM route_detail JOIN route ON route_detail.username = route.username AND route_detail.route_code = route.route_code WHERE route_detail.route_code = #{route_code} and route_detail.username = #{username} ORDER BY route_detail.route_date asc, route_detail.route_order asc;

SELECT r.routename, rd.route_date, rd.site FROM route r JOIN route_detail rd ON r.route_code = rd.route_code AND r.username = rd.username WHERE r.route_code = #{route_code} AND r.username = #{username}
